# Ad.Agio - Neodata Group

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="320"
  height="250"
  type="adagio"
  data-sid="39"
  data-loc="amp_ampw_amps_ampp_300x250"
  data-keywords=""
  data-uservars=""
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the ad network or refer to their documentation.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-sid`
-   `data-loc`
-   `data-keywords`
-   `data-uservars`
